about_the_game:
Scatter the zombies summoned by your viewers! 

🔵 Zombies emerge in response to comments on YouTube or Twitch! 🧟🧟‍♀️🧟‍♂️
🔴 Collect bullets and healing items to defeat zombies through supportive comments and super chats! ❤️‍🩹
🔵 VRM model compatible! Dive into the game world as your own 3D avatar if you have a model! ✨

5 Exciting Game Modes to Explore!

🔵 Survival Mode
The most basic mode: survive within the time limit, defeat hordes of zombies, and aim for a high score! Be cautious—if you're taken down, your score resets to 0. Strategize whether to fight or flee!

🔴 Tower Defense Mode
Defend the monument from being destroyed during the time limit. You can respawn infinitely, making this mode perfect even for those new to TPS games!

🔵 Treasure Hunt Mode
A unique mode where bringing treasure back to your base earns you massive points. With 3 lives and a 30-minute time limit, completing all objectives grants an impressive 400,000-point bonus under special rules!

🔴 Endless Mode
A timeless version of Survival Mode. Even if you're defeated, your score is recorded. This mode is the ultimate endgame content for hardcore Streamer VS Zombie fans!

🔵 Offline Mode
Play without OneComme integration. Perfect for personal practice or for your viewers to enjoy the game on their own!

How to Link and Verify "OneComme" Integration

  • Follow the "Installation Guide"
    Complete the following steps in the "Introduction Guide" of OneComme:

    • Install OneComme.

    • Perform the initial setup.

    • Enable comment retrieval.
      These steps will automatically link your game with OneComme.

  • Verify Integration

    • Launch OneComme and click the "…" menu in the top-right corner. Select Comment Tester.

    • Post a comment using the configured Zombie Word (default: @Z).

    • Check if the zombie gauge on the top-left corner of your game screen rises.
      If the gauge increases, the integration is successfully verified.

Additional Information

  • VRM 1.0 is not supported.

  • Due to potential updates in OneComme's specifications, some features may become non-functional.

  • Streaming of this game is fully permitted as long as it does not violate public order or morality.
